To install the latest development version of `r glue::glue("**{getOption('usethis.description')$Package}**")`, run the following in R:

`r paste0('\x60\x60\x60r
if (!("remotes" %in% rownames(installed.packages()))) {
  install.packages(pkgs = "remotes",
                   repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org/")
}
', paste0('remotes::install_gitlab(repo = "', stringr::str_remove(string = getOption('usethis.description')$URL, pattern = "^https?://.+?\\..+?/"), '")'), '
\x60\x60\x60')`
